result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for parsing and type-checking Go source files, inspecting the types and values of expressions.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to type-checking and expression evaluation in a single Go file.

gotypes/typeandvalue/main.go.purpose: This file parses and type-checks a Go source file, inspecting the types and values of expressions.
side_effects: Logs fatal errors if parsing or type-checking fails.
